鬴字的基本解释

鬴
fǔ
同“釜”。

鬴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fǔ］
［《廣韻》扶雨切，上麌，奉。］
同“釜1”。
(1)锅。
(2)古代量器名。

鬴字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬲字部】　鬴； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1459第18
【唐韻】扶雨切【集韻】【韻會】奉甫切，?音父。【說文】鍑屬。【玉篇】或作釜。【周禮·地官·廩人】凡萬民之食食者，人四鬴上也。人三鬴中也。人二鬴下也。【註】六斗四升曰鬴。　又【爾雅·釋水】覆鬴，九河之一。【註】水中可居住，而其狀如覆?。　又【集韻】狼狄切，音歷。與鬲同。

鬴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鬴字的起名意思

暂无。

鬴
Basic explanation of words
鬴
fǔ
Same as "kettle".
鬴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [fǔ]
["Guangyun" Helping the rain to cut, go up, and bong. ]
Same as "Cauldron 1".
(1) Pot.
(2) The name of the ancient measuring instrument.
鬴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Feizi Department】　鬴; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1459 Page 18
【Tang Yun】Fuyuqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】Fengfuqie, the sound father. 【Said the text】The genus Fu. [Jade articles] Or make a kettle. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Linren】Anyone who eats all the people is also on the four sides. People are also in the three 鬴中. People are also under the two temples. [Note] Six buckets and four liters are called 鬴.　[Erya·Shishui] Covering Li, one of the Nine Rivers. [Note] It is habitable in the water, and it looks like an overcast.　[Jiyun] Wolf Diqie, sound calendar. Same as Li.
